k_ele.e: 当たらずといえども遠からず
中らずと雖も遠からず
中らずといえども遠からず

r_ele.r: あたらずといえどもとおからず

sense.gloss: not exactly correct, but pretty close to it, not far off the mark

k_ele.e: 靴新しと雖も首に加えず
沓新しと雖も首に加えず

r_ele.r: くつあたらしといえどもくびにくわえず

sense.gloss: there must be a clear distinction between the upper and lower classes, even new shoes must not be worn on the head

k_ele.e: 嘉肴ありと雖も食らわずんばその旨きを知らず

r_ele.r: かこうありといえどもくらわずんばそのうまきをしらず

sense.gloss: one cannot understand even a holy man's teachings without study, one cannot know the abilities of a great man without putting him to use, one cannot know the delicious taste of fine food without eating it

words.word: 中らずと雖も遠からず
words.gloss: not exactly correct, but pretty close to it, not far off the mark

words.word: 靴新しと雖も首に加えず
words.gloss: there must be a clear distinction between the upper and lower classes, even new shoes must not be worn on the head
